title: Onvote
tagline: Anonymous, gasless and modular voting for Web3
description:
The Web3 modular voting system brand embodies innovation and reliability through a minimalist, futuristic design. Utilizing a monochromatic palette of grays and blacks with strategic blue accents, the visual identity features clean lines, geometric shapes, and ample white space. An abstract logo represents modularity and blockchain connectivity, while modern typography and simplified iconography enhance the tech-forward aesthetic. 


This cohesive design system, applied across digital platforms and marketing materials, effectively communicates technological sophistication, trust, and user-friendly accessibility. The result is a forward-thinking brand that positions the voting system as a cutting-edge solution in the Web3 space, aligning seamlessly with its creators' vision and meeting the expectations of tech-savvy users.

title: Degen
description:
The legendary Top Hat design emerged as the winner in the public contest for the Degen logo. Following this victory, we continue to imagine the future of this Open Source brand, constantly shaping different narratives that align with the Degen universe.

Our vision was to channel a diversified identity across various worlds—each one an unlimited stage that opens up to different personalities and moments. The Degen Worlds have served as a conceptual guide in creating another historic milestone for the brand: The Degen Official Store.

But this is just the beginning—because the best of Degen is yet to come.

title: DeFi Wonderland
tagline: To help the web3 ecosystem thrive
description: Wonderland is not a place, it’s a feeling within, a process. An inner urge to make things happen.Being in Era 3.0 means targeting value and community.

title: Vocdoni
description:
We partnered with Vocdoni to redesign their brand identity, positioning them as leaders in the future of voting.

Our approach emphasized a visual identity that conveys their commitment to transparency, security and the progressive evolution of democratic processes. Using Webflow, we developed a no-code website with a dynamic, intuitive UI that underscores the immediacy and accessibility of digital voting.

This new identity and digital experience align with Vocdoni’s mission to transform voting for a secure, decentralized and future-forward democratic landscape.

title: Eigen Layer
tagline: Builder's process for claiming token Airdrop
description:
The main insight of the Eigen Airdrop stems from the fusion of EigenLayer's narrative and brand construction, along with the concept of an airdrop itself.

This allows us to design a carefully thought-out process tailored towards the "web builders" community, with which they can feel identified and challenged, but without leaving aside other audiences.

This airdrop process is divided into 4 phases that the user will need to navigate and complete.

By completing each step, the user will "build" the different concepts, where the blocks of the shapes will gradually fall from the top, reinforcing the "airdrop" concept and immersing themselves even more in the brand.

title: Build
description:
This project is the refreshment of the visual identity of BUILD, a brand native to the Farcaster ecosystem. 

Conceived and built as an open system for the community where the remanence of a retro style based on repetition and error as a source of improvement inspired by the first operating systems of the 80‘s and 90’s is anchored as the core of the visual identity. It is also open source, as the philosophy of the BUILD ecosystem and the community is intended to be a Public Good. 

The new web page is an exercise of how the visual system can be transferred and applied to any digital product in a scalable way.

title: PAID
description:
This project aimed to transform an investment and crowdfunding platform with a mission to empower people by providing access to high-value opportunities. More than just an investment platform, the brand seeks to promote an enriching lifestyle experience that combines wealth creation with community spirit and a unique element of “Fun Fund” investments—making finance not only accessible but also enjoyable and engaging for users.

The brand identity and UX/UI redesign focused on creating an intuitive, accessible and aspirational digital experience, with a visual style and interactive features that reflected the lifestyle concept. This approach positions the platform as an extension of its values and community, establishing it as an inclusive, forward-thinking and enjoyable leader in financial innovation.

title: Node Terminal
tagline: REDEFINING NODE INVESTMENT FOR THE MODERN ERA
description: NodeTerminal represents the perfect convergence of advanced technology and user-centered design. Through our design strategy, we have created more than just a platform; we have built a bridge to the future of digital finance, making the complex accessible and the innovative familiar.This project not only demonstrates our ability to address complex technological challenges, but also our commitment to creating experiences that truly matter and generate a positive impact on people's lives.

title: Nektar
tagline: The essence of the liquid community
description:
Nektar emerges as a hub of transformation and resilience, fusing the fluidity of a liquid with the unifying force of a hive. From its foundations, Nektar has led a revolution, challenging traditional statics and turning assets into a dynamic stream of possibilities.

Boosting liquidity across the ecosystem, allowing assets to circulate freely and adapt to the changing needs of your community. Every transaction is a drop that contributes to the constant flow of innovation and growth.

title: TripTick
tagline: For every trip, a tick; For every dream, a destination
description: Inspired by the magic of discovery, we created a visual identity and user experience that guides travelers as they explore the world. Serving as a digital compass, the innovative AI-powered travel platform adapts intuitively to each user, unveiling hidden gems and unexpected destinations. With a seamless design and fluid interface, trip planning becomes an adventure in itself—turning every interaction into the first step toward something extraordinary.

title: VIPE
description: Cross-platform and always with a license model backing each avatar, unleash your potential in the Metaverse with tokenized VRMs. Express yourself, share your visual representation and thrive in a unified digital universe.

title: BYN
tagline: Community as a Service for a legendary brand
description:
ABC Cultural's Web3 community that gives visibility and voice to digital art in Spanish.
 
The project is inspired by the legendary publication Blanco y Negro, which more than 130 years ago began publishing illustrated information with the collaboration of great artists of the time. Through a Brand3 process, a new brand has been created to support emerging artists and showcase ABC's historical archive through the NFTs.

title: COCOBAY
tagline: Co-creating a Socialverse full of inner worlds
description: COCOBAY is a new Metaverse is construction that wants to give power to the community. A challenge to the limits of the established that allows you to express through your inner world endless possibilities. Each island is a land where you can co-create everything you can imagine and share it with the rest of the users. Because we all have an inner world to share. In COCOBAY you will not only have the possibility to express it and open it to the public, but people will be able to interact with you in your world, just as you will be able to explore what others have inside.

title: D4
tagline: Building a powerful Brand3 for crypto investment leaders
description:
We developed a distinctive digital strategy inspired by the strength, fluidity and discipline of kendo, aligning with the forward-thinking principles of Web3

Our approach embraces the emergence of a decentralized data economy. The UI design delivers a refined, intuitive experience that guides users seamlessly, reflecting the ethos of data democratization and symbolizing the disruption of centralized power structures and the rise of a new, user-empowered data ecosystem.

In our audiovisual production, we integrate Datamosh techniques to create impactful transitions and MetaHuman technology to render realistic, expressive characters, capturing the intensity and precision of Kendo.
